reviewText: I saw that reviewers said it's recycled stuff, but I hadn't seen most of it, except Stacy Sanchez' scene. My favorite scene shows Laura Cover, and it's rather sexy for "Playboy" videos. Nikki Schieler-Zierling has a good scene too, and so do several other girls, e.g. Lauren Hill and Jennifer Walcott. This is not anywhere near my favorite "Playboy" offering, but I do think it's worth owning, mainly for Laura Cover's scene. I hate Pam Anderson, and Stacy Sanchez doesn't thrill me. There are so many girls on this video that I can't recall all of them. I never watch them though.

The DVD  "PRIME TIME PLAYMATES" is a good choice of previous segments featuring famous playmates.
Buy this DVD if you want a overview of a lot of the best playmates.
